Uses of Interface
com.gemstone.gemfire.admin.AlertListener

  • Packages that use AlertListener 
    Package Description
    com.gemstone.gemfire.admin
    Provides an API for administering various GemFire components such as a GemFire distributed system, and processes that host GemFire Caches.

    • Uses of AlertListener in com.gemstone.gemfire.admin

      Methods in com.gemstone.gemfire.admin with parameters of type AlertListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AdminDistributedSystem.addAlertListener(AlertListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Registers an AlertListener that will receive all alerts that are at or above the alert level.
      void AdminDistributedSystem.removeAlertListener(AlertListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Unregisters an AlertListener
